name: Wolverine

abilities.name: Adamantium Claws
abilities.details: Slashes viciously with his indestructible claws, applying a bleed effect.

abilities.name: Berserker Barrage
abilities.details: Unleashes a flurry of rapid claw strikes in front of him.

abilities.name: Feral Lunge
abilities.details: Leaps towards an enemy with claws extended, dealing damage on impact.

ultimate.name: Berserker Rage
ultimate.effect: Enters a feral rage for 8s: Greatly increased attack speed, damage, and lifesteal. Healing Factor rate doubled.
ultimate.details: Goes into his iconic, uncontrollable rage state.

passives.name: Healing Factor
passives.details: Rapidly regenerates health (~15 HP/s?) when not taking damage for a few seconds.

passives.name: Adamantium Skeleton
passives.details: Provides a base level of passive damage reduction (~10%?).

lore: Logan, a mutant with retractable bone claws, enhanced senses, and a powerful healing factor. His skeleton was later bonded with the indestructible metal Adamantium. Wolverine is a gruff, often solitary member of the X-Men and Avengers.

comics.title: Uncanny X-Men (various series, particularly Claremont run)
Wolverine (various series, particularly Miller/Claremont limited series)
